Key Match Events: Nico Elvedi was sent off for a last-man foul on Kasper Dolberg.
Granit Xhaka received a second yellow card for a late challenge on Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg.
Patrick Dorgu scored the winning goal for Denmark.
Post-Match Reflections: Joachim Andersen described Granit Xhaka as 'a top footballer, but a bit of a b***h.'
Granit Xhaka will be suspended for Switzerland's next match against Spain.
